title: Special Edition: How Slovaks discovered podcasting
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
Around the time when The Slovak Spectator started producing its Last Week in Slovakia podcast in October, Slovakia's nationwide daily Sme also launched a podcast of its own.

First, it was just an experiment and they did not know that they were starting a sort of podcast revolution in the country.

Dávid Tvrdoň, digital product manager at the Sme daily, shares his experiences with podcasting in Slovakia.

Read more at https://spectator.sme.sk/c/20863626/slovaks-have-discovered-podcasting.html

The audio news overview Last Week in Slovakia is taking a summer break and will be back on July 18.

Readers  of The Slovak Spectator are receiving Last Week in Slovakia every Thursday morning as part of their subscription. 
More information:
Print+audio: shop.spectator.sme.sk/newspaper 
Online+audio: www.sme.sk/predplatne-spectator/
